discourse_list.title: Stats on the State of Maker 06 - 3 Billion Dai Now In Circulation!

content.content: Thanks for checking out this update on the state and growth of Maker!  Highlights Most notably, there are now over 3 billion Dai in circulation! Over the last two weeks, debt ceilings have gone from 4.36B to 19.39B, lowering the utilization ratio from 65.55% to 16.22%.  Dai Dai Price: $1.001 Circulating Dai / Debt Ceiling / Utilization: 3,145,133,331 / 19,390,500,000 / 16.22% Total Collateral / Collateralization: 8,720,024,327 / 277.25% DAIly Active Addresses  Daily Active Addresses1894×703 96.8 KB  Source  Vaults Open Vaults: 22,430 Total Fees Owed: 112,047,430 Liquidations Initiated (3/20 - 4/2): 4 (45 complete) View details  MKR MKR Price: $2,453 Market Capitalization: $2,460,745,859.76 MKR Supply: 995,238 MKR Burned (Total / Total Supply): 4,761.22 / 995238.78 Surplus Buffer (Now / To burn MKR / est’d time): 16,069,343.59 / 30,000,000 / 33.29 days Annual Burn (estimated): 45,677.79 MKR P/E: 21.96  Governance Executive Votes (Past week): 2 View Votes Governance Polls: 4 View Polls  More Stats?
